mapper.select: select SID, ITEMID, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, PRICETYPE, SITE, PRICE, SKU, FLAG, ERROR, OPER, OPERTIME, NEWITEMID, OLDSKU, OLDSHOPID, OLDSHOPNAME, TEMPLATEID, STARTPRICE, ENDPRICE, PAYPALADDRESS, NEWTITLE, OLDTITLE, ADDRESSFLAG, PHOTONUM, PRICESELL, EXPRESSTYPE3, TITLEFLAG, SELLPRICEFLAG, CUSTOMFLAG, SAVENUMFLAG, CLEARANCEFLAG, EXPRESSFLAG, PIC, LISTINGDURATION, PRICEFLAG, EXPRESSTYPE4, RELISTFLAG, SAVENUM, EXPRESSTYPE5, EXPRESSTYPE, EXPRESSTYPE2, ITEMFLAG, SELLPRICE, SKUFLAG, FREIGHTID, PHOTOFLAG, GOODSFLAG, AUCTIONFLAG, EXPRESSTYPE1, DESCRFLAG, EXPRESSTYPE6, ATTRIBUTESTATUSFLAG from DB_POSTITEM where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
